title: My in-game settings keep getting reset?
body:
Yesterday I played with my original settings just fine then went to sleep. Woke up today, and ALL my settings reset. I thought that it wasn't a big deal, but after I spent 20-30 minutes making my settings back to normal again, I relogged and they just reset again. 

I have multiple accounts that this keeps happening on to.. so its not just one. 

also probably completely unrelated, but the mobile chat app, is refusing to log out of my account too..

replies.body: Server side settings were disabled for a bit while the dev investigated some issues. Be sure to check the [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for updates on this!
Those settings aren't saved client side, which is why they keep resetting now because the client isn't able to pull the settings that are saved server side....

You'll see copies of them in there, but when you launch the client and start a game those are updated with the settings saved on the servers. Ergo - they are saved locally but they get overwritten with the ones saved server side each time. Been this way for as long as I can remember, possibly since the game launched.

Well I did check that before hand, and I didn't say anything about it before I started posting this. But am I getting my settings back? or do I have to completely make new ones once the devs figure out the problems. Doesn't matter either way, just curious. :)
Exact same issue with me, I refuse to play and keep changing. It hurts my play and is flat out annoying

I AM FURIOUS. All my settings are reset. It just happened 30 minutes ago. I was playing a game before that everything was fine. and now i log into another account and it is all GONE
 SEND HELP
Same exact issue happens to me, everytime i login i have to keybind everything again plus configure video settings too
got an error message saying unable to retrieve settings from server and they've been reset. need some answer now @riot
I have exactly the same problem as above ^ please help this is frustrating @riot
Same here, I just made another account because I want to test the new leveling that they'll introduce (at least the before lvl 30 part) and when I logged back in all my settings were reset
As explained on the other thread, same has happened to me, realy frustrating.
Also happens to my account, reinstalling lol seems to have solved the problem for me. Hope that helps.
